name: Hivoovoo Pty
slogan: Brand name TBC. A startup launching a range of gardening tools that modern gardeners love

team.title: Director
team.name: Josh Armstrong
team.bioHtml: Founder of CommsLab, recently acquired digital advertising agency. Launching new consumer product startup.

jobs.title: Supply Chain and Manufacture Co-Founder
jobs.description:
I am looking for an ambitious and eager startup co-founder who is passionate about creating a positive impact loveable brand to disrupt the $23bn gardening supply industry. You should believe in the power of sustainable design, and have experience in managing and optimising the supply chain for D2C brands. We will co-manage a product design and mechanical engineering team to ensure the products solve real problems, surpass user expectations but importantly are manufactured to create a strong business. We will work together to strive towards becoming a B-Corp, and eventually becoming carbon neutral. This role is negotiable depending on the person.

PROGRESS:
Initial market testing has been completed with global home trials of competitor products, 700+ response survey across 4 core markets, 600 email addresses captured and technical scoping underway.
